attacks.name: Swoop
attacks.special: If a Crit is rolled, the target is Prone.

attacks.name: Lift and Drop
attacks.special: This Attack may only be made on a Character on a 30mm base size, and if the Hellbeast is not currently using Grasping Talons. On a Crit, the target is moved D6 inches in the direction of the Dark Lord player's choosing.
